section.p: The sync element contains elements for controlling synchronization.

row.entry: States whether the Dashboard uses LDAP rather than the Eucalyptus database for log-ins. Set to true to turn on LDAP web logging. Set to false to use the Eucalyptus database for web logging. If set to false, you can ignore all other fields in this section. Default value: false
Set to true to turn on automatic synchronization. Set to false to turn off synchronization.
The length in milliseconds of the automatic synchronization interval.

Parmeter denoting whether to remove identity entities from Eucalyptus when they are deleted from LDAP. Set to true if you want Eucalyptus to remove any identities once their counterparts in LDAP are deleted. Set to false if you want these identities kept without being purged.
